text: Lisa Murkowski, done with Donald Trump, won't rule out leaving GOP  —  Hear more on Sen. Lisa Murkowski's plans on “Inside Politics Sunday with Manu Raju” at 8 a.m. ET and 11 a.m. ET.﻿  —  Sen.
